function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Accidental positive effects on the environment and natural ecosystems due to government-imposed measures","category":"Environmental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High levels of air pollutants such as formaldehyde, carbon monoxide, and particulate matter pm 2.5 are associated with increased covid-19 infections and fatalities.","category":"Air quality and pollution effects","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of integration of infection prevention in sustainable designs","category":"Environmental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of core built environment microbiome dominated by specific bacterial taxa","category":"Environmental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex indoor air flows due to temperature differences and heat production exacerbating viral distribution unpredictability","category":"Air quality and pollution effects","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective control methods for tsetse flies","category":"Biodiversity and ecological impacts","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Temporary reduction in co2 and no2 emissions due to lockdown","category":"Climate change effects","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate wastewater management leading to potential contamination and spread of infectious diseases.","category":"Wastewater and sanitation risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Over-reliance on indoor cooling systems leading to increased electricity consumption, energy demand, and greenhouse gas emissions during heat waves.","category":"Energy consumption and sustainability issues","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in waste collection time of 72 hours","category":"Wastewater and sanitation risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreasing efficacy of disinfectant techniques in wastewater","category":"Wastewater and sanitation risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reduction in visits to green spaces due to mobility restrictions and fear of infection during the pandemic","category":"Urbanization and habitat loss","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in humidity impact susceptibility to infection and viral particle deposition in the respiratory tract","category":"Climate change effects","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emergence and re-emergence of tick-and mosquito-borne diseases in canada due to climate change","category":"Climate change effects","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Extremities in pollution and unhygienic levels resulting from human activities","category":"Pollution increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Climate loss","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High temperature differentials between day and night in the summer","category":"Climate change effects","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of early
